mapper.select:
SELECT u.id as id, u.login_name as login_name, u.mobile as mobile, u.email as email, u.source as source, u.channel as channel, u.province as province, u.city as city, u.register_time as register_time, u.status as status, u.user_name as user_name, u.identity_number as identity_number, (select mobile from user referrer where referrer.login_name = u.referrer) AS referrer_mobile, IF(exists (select 1 from auto_invest_plan au where u.login_name = au.login_name and enabled is TRUE), "0", "1") as auto_invest_status, IF(exists (select 1 from user_role referrer_role where referrer_role.login_name = u.referrer and referrer_role.role in ('SD_STAFF', 'ZC_STAFF')), TRUE, FALSE) as is_referrer_staff, IF(exists (select 1 from user_role where user_role.login_name = u.login_name and user_role.role in ('SD_STAFF', 'ZC_STAFF')), TRUE, FALSE) as is_staff, IF(exists (select 1 from bank_card where bank_card.login_name = u.login_name and bank_card.status = 'PASSED'), TRUE, FALSE) as is_bind_bank_card, IF(exists (select 1 from bank_card where bank_card.login_name = u.login_name and bank_card.status = 'PASSED' and bank_card.is_fast_pay_on = 1), TRUE, FALSE) as fast_pay, u.staff_referrer_mobile as staff_mobile from
user u
(select j.* from user j JOIN (select k.login_name from user_role o RIGHT join referrer_relation k on o.login_name = k.referrer_login_name and k.level = 1 where o.role = 'SD_STAFF') gg on j.login_name = gg.login_name) u
(select j.* from user j JOIN (select k.login_name from user_role o RIGHT join referrer_relation k on o.login_name = k.referrer_login_name and k.level = 1 where o.role = 'ZC_STAFF') gg on j.login_name = gg.login_name) u
user u join user_role r on u.login_name = r.login_name
left join account a on u.login_name = a.login_name
and r.role = #{roleStage}
and u.email like '${email}%'
and u.mobile like '${mobile}%'
and u.login_name = #{loginName}
and u.register_time >= #{beginTime}
and u.register_time <= #{endTime}
and exists (select 1 from user referrer where u.referrer = referrer.login_name and referrer.mobile = #{referrerMobile})
and u.channel = #{channel}
and u.source = #{source}
and IF(exists (select 1 from bank_card where bank_card.login_name = u.login_name and bank_card.status = 'PASSED'), TRUE, FALSE)
and IF(exists (select 1 from bank_card where bank_card.login_name = u.login_name and bank_card.status = 'PASSED' and bank_card.is_fast_pay_on = 1), TRUE, FALSE)
and IF(exists (select 1 from recharge where recharge.login_name = u.login_name and recharge.status = 'SUCCESS'), TRUE, FALSE)
and IF(exists (select 1 from invest where invest.login_name = u.login_name and invest.status = 'SUCCESS'), TRUE, FALSE)
and (select count(1) from invest where invest.login_name = u.login_name and invest.status = 'SUCCESS') > 1
and u.staff_referrer_mobile is not null
and u.staff_referrer_mobile is null
and u.staff_referrer_mobile like '${staffMobile}%'
order by u.register_time desc limit #{index}, #{pageSize}

select count(1) from
user u
(select j.* from user j JOIN (select k.login_name from user_role o RIGHT join referrer_relation k on o.login_name = k.referrer_login_name and k.level = 1 where o.role = 'SD_STAFF') gg on j.login_name = gg.login_name) u
(select j.* from user j JOIN (select k.login_name from user_role o RIGHT join referrer_relation k on o.login_name = k.referrer_login_name and k.level = 1 where o.role = 'ZC_STAFF') gg on j.login_name = gg.login_name) u
user u join user_role r on u.login_name = r.login_name
and r.role = #{roleStage}
and u.email like '${email}%'
and u.mobile like '${mobile}%'
and u.login_name = #{loginName}
and u.register_time >= #{beginTime}
and u.register_time <= #{endTime}
and exists (select 1 from user referrer where u.referrer = referrer.login_name and referrer.mobile = #{referrerMobile})
and u.channel = #{channel}
and u.source = #{source}
and IF(exists (select 1 from bank_card where bank_card.login_name = u.login_name and bank_card.status = 'PASSED'), TRUE, FALSE)
and IF(exists (select 1 from bank_card where bank_card.login_name = u.login_name and bank_card.status = 'PASSED' and bank_card.is_fast_pay_on = 1), TRUE, FALSE)
and IF(exists (select 1 from recharge where recharge.login_name = u.login_name and recharge.status = 'SUCCESS'), TRUE, FALSE)
and IF(exists (select 1 from invest where invest.login_name = u.login_name and invest.status = 'SUCCESS'), TRUE, FALSE)
and (select count(1) from invest where invest.login_name = u.login_name and invest.status = 'SUCCESS') > 1
and u.staff_referrer_mobile is not null
and u.staff_referrer_mobile is null
and u.staff_referrer_mobile like '${staffMobile}%'
select ifnull(count(*),0) from user where channel = #{channel}

select login_name from user where user.login_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{loginName}), '%') and exists(select 1 from user_role where user_role.login_name = user.login_name and user_role.role in ('SD_STAFF', 'ZC_STAFF'))
select mobile from user where mobile like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mobile}), '%')
select login_name from user where login_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{loginName}), '%')
select t.login_name from user t JOIN user_role r ON t.`login_name` = r.`login_name` AND r.`role` = 'LOANER' where t.login_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{loginName}), '%')
select login_name from user where login_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{loginName}), '%') and exists (select 1 from account where account.login_name = user.login_name)
select IFNULL(channel,'') from user group by channel order by channel desc
select count(1) from user where register_time >= #{startTime}
